title: Different Paths
description: ***Previously Published in Breakup or Makeup?: A Crazy Ink Anthology***All good things must come to an end...or do they?Sydney and Nick believed as long as they had each other, they could handle anything life threw their way. The “perfect” high school couple; they loved each other, committed themselves to one another and thought they had their future planned out. When secrets and miscommunications reveal the cracks in their relationship, will this couple stay on the same path to their happily ever after or go their separate ways?
author: E.S. McMillan
